#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

using namespace std;
namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}



shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendRequestVoteSynchronously(parid_t par_id,
                                        const uint64_t& candidateId,
                                        const uint64_t& candidateTerm,
                                        const uint64_t& lastLogIndex,
                                        const uint64_t& lastLogTerm,
                                        const uint64_t& logSize,
                                        const uint64_t& targetServerId,
                                        bool_t *vote_granted,
                                        uint64_t *term) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == targetServerId) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;


      fuattr.callback = [vote_granted, term, ev](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> *vote_granted;
        fu->get_reply() >> *term;
                /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVoteSync, candidateId, candidateTerm, lastLogIndex, lastLogTerm, logSize, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendAppendEntriesMy(parid_t par_id,
                            const uint64_t& leaderTerm,
                            const uint64_t& leaderId,
                            const uint64_t& leaderCommitIndex,
                            const vector<uint64_t>& logTerms,
                            const vector<shared_ptr<Marshallable>>& logCmd,
                            const uint64_t& prevlogIndex,
                            const uint64_t& prevLogTerm,
                            const uint64_t& targetServerId,


                            uint64_t *term,
                            bool_t *success,
                            uint64_t *ack) {
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == targetServerId) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [term, success, ack, ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *term;
        fu->get_reply() >> *success;
        fu->get_reply() >> *ack;
              };
      vector<MarshallDeputy> logCmdNew;
      for(long i = 0; i<logCmd.size(); i++) {
          MarshallDeputy md(logCmd[i]);
          logCmdNew.push_back(md);
      }


      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntriesMy, leaderTerm, leaderId, leaderCommitIndex, logTerms, logCmdNew,
      prevlogIndex, prevLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

void RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t arg1,
                                uint64_t arg2) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        uint64_t ret1;
        bool_t vote_granted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> ret1;
        fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, arg1, arg2, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [](Future* fu) {
        bool_t followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, md, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
